name: Iran Donate
author: Mehrnoosh Shabani

sections.description:
Iran Donate plugin helps to get donations from faragate and zarinpal Network gateway systems,

It has a user-friendly and simple interface which allows to place the donate button anywhere on the site and when user donate your site plugin send one sms to him and we use fara payamek sms Service for it.

you can Customize sms txt and manage all payments in wordpress dashbord.

Features

  • Customize payment form (change their size, type, custom image).
  • Support for SMS services more
  • Support more Portal Pay
  • Translating into more languages
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin `Iran Donate` folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory.
  2. Activate the plugin using the ‘آسان پرداخت’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
  3. complete plugin settings
  4. for show paymant for use [irdonateay_form] shortcode.
  5. for see reprot of paymeny using the ‘گزارش پرداخت ها’ submenu in your WordPress admin panel.
